::Hot Rod/Epyon::

"Yes," Hot Rod says to Khonkolor, as Dragoon's shots come in.
Hot Rod jumps up, shooting for laser blasts at Dragoon.

Epyon jumps and flips over the disks. He draws his saber, and comes down
slashing at Nightstrike.
